subject: Olympic Games (2010)
organizations: United States Ski and Snowboard Assn
lead_paragraph: In a span of 48 hours, Scotty Lago went from a lesser-known U.S. snowboarder to an Olympic medalist, and then to notoriety when sexually suggestive photographs surfaced.
snippet: In a span of 48 hours, Scotty Lago went from a lesser-known U.S. snowboarder to an Olympic medalist, and then to notoriety when sexually suggestive photographs surfaced.
